wikipedia_page.main: John Wilkinson (13 June 1902 – April 1979) was an English footballer who scored 44 goals in 212 appearances in the Football League playing for Sheffield Wednesday, Newcastle United, Lincoln City and Hull City. He then moved into non-league football with Scunthorpe & Lindsey United. He played as an outside left.
